pages.text: And that He created in pairs— Male and female
From a seed when placed (finally in the womb)
And that He has promised a second Creation (by raising the dead at Resurrection)
And that it is He Who gives wealth and satisfaction
That He is the Lord of Sirius (Shi'ra, the Mighty Star in the constellation of Canis Major)
And that it is He Who destroyed the (powerful) 'Ad (people) of the old
And the Samood (Thamud), and (He) did not grant them an eternal life
And before them, the people of Nuh (Noah) because they were (all) most unjust and most arrogant (people) exceeding their limits
And He destroyed the defeated Cities (of Sodom and Gomorrah)
So that (soil and debris) have covered them up
Then which of the gifts of your Lord (O man) will you question
This is a warner (the Prophet), from the (number of) warners of old
The (Judgment) ever approaching comes nearer
None besides Allah, can alter (the timing of) it
Then, do you wonder at (the recitation of) this message
And will you laugh and not weep—
Wasting your time in useless things
But you fall down in prostration to Allah, and (adoringly) worship (Him)
The Hour (of Judgment) has drawn nearer, and the moon has been torn apart (cleft asunder)
And if they see a Sign they turn away, and say: "This is persistent magic
They reject (the warning) and follow their (own) desires and every matter has its appointed time
And indeed there have already come to them, recitations in which there is (enough) warning
Perfect wisdom (in this Quran)— But (the preaching of) warners does not profit them
Therefore, (O Prophet,) turn away from them. The Day when the Caller will call (them) to a terrible affair
